channel.title: Is this a good laptop?
channel.description:
Hi, I have £400 to buy a laptop and i am looking for one that will be able to run multiple programs at the same time.
I also want to be able to run any online games like RuneScape without any problems
This is the best one i have managhed to find.
[url=http://www.novatech.co.uk/novatech/laptop/range/v144100.html]http://www.novatech.co.uk/novatech/laptop/range/v144100.html[/url]

item.title: Is this a good laptop?
item.dc:creator: @kingspiker kingspiker
item.description:
@kingspiker wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:15, topic:354316"][quote author=kingspiker link=topic=450611.msg3307084#msg3307084 date=1281736284]
i would not buy a labtop with a Intel cpu in it even if the were giveing them away for free!

get a lab top with a AMD Phenom II X4 OR a AMD Phenom II
with 12gigs of DDR3 ram
and my be like a ATi Radeon HD 4650

it would cost a lot but fuck Intel there pieces of shit im not good with laptops because there all fucking rip offs just like buying a dell or hp desktop “they always cost 2x more then the hardware in them”
[/quote]

FIRST OF ALL, it’s not a labtop, it’s a LAPTOP, stop acting so fucking smart because your parents bought you your system.[/quote]
stuf asshole sorry my FUCKING ENGLISH IS NOT TO YOUR LIKENESS! And you wish my parents bought my system because its the only one like it because i fucking made it its not fucking hard to make a PC “Sorry that i work for every thing i have” “my parents don’t give my shit”

item.title: Is this a good laptop?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:3, topic:354316”][quote author=WowILikeToCode link=topic=450611.msg3305211#msg3305211 date=1281614841]
Hi, I have £400 to buy a laptop and i am looking for one that will be able to run multiple programs at the same time.

I also want to be able to run any online games like RuneScape without any problems

This is the best one i have managhed to find.

http://www.novatech.co.uk/novatech/laptop/range/v144100.html
[/quote]

1066Mhz of speed isn’t very good…[/quote]
You clearly don’t know what you are talking about; that’s the speed of the memory and that’s a decent speed.

@OP: For the price that laptop isn’t too bad but to be honest I would stretch your budget a little bit further and invest in a laptop which will be future proof. The two major letdowns of this laptop is the processor and the graphics. I would adivse buying something with an i3 processor and some sort of dedicated graphics card (or even intel HD at the very least). You would probably have to spend over 500 quid to get a decent one in that spec range.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good laptop?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:6, topic:354316”]The only online games i play are Habbo Hotel and RuneScape. And occasionally things on Miniclip and that kinda thing.

At the moment i’m using a HP G60-213em (my brothers laptop) and i think it is really good laptop. Except the problem im recently having with the battery life. Its specs can be found Here[/quote]

Oooh, Habbo? what’s your name on it? im aaronaaron.

A netbook isn’t anything special specs wise, but it’s okay. But if you are having problems with the battery life, that’s odd because the battery is built to last on the netbooks. ;(
